content.text: Hey Vistia, is now a good time to buy EGLD?

RSI is currently at 67.3, indicating the asset is nearing overbought territory. However, RSI-14 is still at 57.3, meaning the trend is intact. If EGLD breaks above $13.40 with high volume, we may see further upside. Watch resistance at $13.50.
Do you see a trend reversal for EGLD?

Buy pressure is strong, but price is testing the previous high at $13.35. If it fails to break with sufficient volume, a rejection could follow. RSI dropping from 72 to 63 suggests momentum is slowing. If support at $13.10 fails, expect a pullback to $12.90.
